DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the safety and efficacy of bepotastine besilate ophthalmic solution in allergic conjunctivitis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bepotastine Besilate Ophthalmic Solution in Allergic Conjunctivitis Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects 12 years of age and older with 2year history of allergic conjunctivitis No active ocular or nasal infection
